turns.speaker: speaker1
turns.text: Hello, how are you today?

turns.speaker: speaker2
turns.text: hi,it was another day

turns.speaker: speaker1
turns.text: I see, same here for me. Have you every tried donation through HITs?

turns.speaker: speaker2
turns.text: ya recently i too tried children's charity regarding their studies.it makes me good

turns.speaker: speaker1
turns.text: I usually donate a good part of my bonus in different studies, but I specially have a soft heart for children. Have you ever heard about "Save the Children" before?

turns.speaker: speaker2
turns.text: children must be educated i didn\'t heard about  "save the children" what is the procedure of giving donation?

turns.speaker: speaker1
turns.text: They work on different issues in almost 120 countries. They work on education, hunger, health and emergency issues.

turns.speaker: speaker2
turns.text: really it is pleased to hear this who s taking care of this charity?how they managing in 120 countries?

turns.speaker: speaker1
turns.text: they either have parties, or they travel to those countries. There are big groups working with them, like IKEA and Walt Disney Studios. you can read more on this link:  URL s/about-us/leadership-and-trustees

turns.speaker: speaker2
turns.text: sure i will check this link.is there any procedure to join as a member in that group?even a normal people from middle class can join in that group?

turns.speaker: speaker1
turns.text: I believe everyone can join to help. I've talked to someone who worked there and she already traveled to Africa. I would be so pleased to try it but I do not have enough off days to join.

turns.speaker: speaker2
turns.text: people who have king heart must join as a member or sponsor a child i too refer some friends in m y circle

turns.speaker: speaker1
turns.text: I know right, It is a big thing to do. some people donate whole their life and time. I like how they managed to donate through HITs too, since website has minimum amount option, but through HIT you can even help 1 cent and more

turns.speaker: speaker2
turns.text: i asked in the previous chat what is the procedure to donate?

turns.speaker: speaker1
turns.text: On the website there is a link to donate: https://support. URL ite/Donation2?df_id=1620&1620.donation=form1

turns.speaker: speaker2
turns.text: okay i have a check is it any discloser of our identity in donating low or high amount

turns.speaker: speaker1
turns.text: No, itt will be anonymously. You can also donate at the end of this HIT, It can be any amount even 0, You'll be asked.

turns.speaker: speaker2
turns.text: whetehr i acn trust this charity?from the begining you ae talking about this chaarity only not others are you a member of this charity?there is no other children charity ?

turns.speaker: speaker1
turns.text: I donated before, since they have very clear financial reports on their website and they are connected to other big organizations I trust them. I am not a member, but i donate. I mean I am not aware of other charities i can trust. There are a few for sure.

turns.speaker: speaker2
turns.text: ohh thats nice of you surely i too have an opinion in this charity and i will donate as much i can possible and share with my friends

turns.speaker: speaker1
turns.text: Thank you for your time and effort. It was such a pleasure to chat with you. Have a good night, take care :)
